newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank 3-month bill auction attracts no bid.
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank 3-month bill auction attracts no bid.

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) said on Wednesday that no bids had been submitted at its auction of an unspecified tranche of three-month liquidity bills.
Dealers on the Slovak interbank money market said the auction failed due to a current lack of funds on the market, and it would not have much impact on it.
"There was nothing to bid with, as the market situation is rather strange now, with money having vanished probably temporarily on to a foreign exchange market," said Martin Viest of Polnobanka.
